metadata.title: CVE-2018-19352 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Jupyter Notebook before 5.7.2 allows XSS via a crafted directory namebecause notebook/static/tree/js/notebooklist.js handles certain URLsunsafely.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.7.4-1
python-notebook - 5.7.4-1
python3-notebook - 5.7.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.4-1').
